vulnerability.name: USN-4667-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4667-1 fixed a vulnerability in APT. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Kevin Backhouse discovered that APT incorrectly handled certain packages.  A local attacker could possibly use this issue to cause APT to crash or  stop responding, resulting in a denial of service.

statements.status_notes: APT could be made to crash or stop responding if it opened a specially crafted file. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
